title: The Passion of the Christ
description: A depiction of the last 12 hours in the life of Jesus of Nazareth.

title: God's Not Dead
description: A Christian student defends his faith and debates a philosophy professor.

title: War Room
description: A seemingly perfect family looks to fix their problems with the help of Miss Clara, an older, wiser woman.

title: ABATTOIR
description: A new rising of the dawn in the power of God over occultic and evil powers.

title: The Prince of Egypt
description: Young Joseph is a dreamer, indulged by his father and resented by his older brothers who soon sell him into slavery without their father's knowledge.

title: I Am Gabriel
description: An angel comes to a small town to restore faith.

title: Fireproof
description: A firefighter uses a 40-day experiment to save his marriage.

title: The Case for Christ
description: An investigative journalist and self-proclaimed atheist sets out to disprove the existence of God after his wife becomes a Christian.

title: Heaven is for Real
description: A young boy claims to have visited heaven during a near death experience.

title: The Shack
description: A grieving man receives a mysterious, personal invitation to meet with God at a place called 'The Shack'.

title: Facing the Giants
description: A high school football coach uses his undying faith to battle the giants of fear and failure.

title: Courageous
description: Four men with one calling: To serve and protect.

title: Risen
description: A Roman soldier witnesses the resurrection of Jesus Christ.

title: Unplanned
description: The true story of a clinic director who turns pro-life.

title: The Book of Eli
description: A lone warrior defends a sacred book in a post-apocalyptic world.

title: Son of God
description: The life story of Jesus is told from his humble birth through his teachings, crucifixion and ultimate resurrection.

title: The Gospel of John
description: The life and toils of Jesus Christ, depicted as written in the Gospel of John.

title: Miracles from Heaven
description: A young girl suffering from a rare digestive disorder finds herself miraculously cured after surviving a terrible accident.

title: Breakthrough
description: When her 14-year-old son drowns in a lake, a mother prays for him to come back from the brink of death and be healed.

title: Do You Believe?
description: When a pastor is shaken by the visible faith of a street-corner preacher, he is reminded that true belief always requires action.

title: Faith Like Potatoes
description: Based on the true story of a South African farmer who turns his life around after finding faith.

title: Paul, Apostle of Christ
description: The story of Paul, who was known as a ruthless persecutor of Christians before his conversion to Christianity.

title: Samson
description: After losing the love of his life to a cruel Philistine prince, a young Hebrew with Supernatural strength defends his people.

title: Soul Surfer
description: The true story of surfer Bethany Hamilton, who lost her arm in a shark attack but continued to surf.

title: Woodlawn
description: A high school football team finds faith and unity amidst racial tensions in the 1970s.

title: Ben-Hur
description: A Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, but regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

title: The Nativity Story
description: A drama that focuses on the period in Mary and Joseph's life where they journeyed to Bethlehem for the birth of Jesus.

title: The Encounter
description: Five strangers with nothing in common are forced to come together at a remote roadside eatery because of a road closure.

title: Letters to God
description: A young boy fighting cancer writes letters to God, touching lives in his neighborhood and community.

title: The Ultimate Gift
description: A deceased billionaire leaves his spoiled adult grandson a series of odd tasks to perform in order to receive 'the ultimate gift,' with the resentful young man having no idea what that might be.

title: Let Go and Let God
description: Two people from vastly different worlds whose lives are rocked after experiencing sudden deaths in their family. They question God as a result, but find the faith they're looking for on an unexpected path.
